title: Kapil Mishra on the move, amidst MP fire, BJP keeps him at hand but at arm's distance - The Indian Express
content:
1. Kapil Mishra on the move, amidst MP fire, BJP keeps him at hand but at arm's distance  The Indian Express
  2. M.P: Asaduddin Owaisi Takes On 'Bulldozer Mama' CM Shivraj Singh Chouhan | Ram Navami Rampage  India Today
  3. Digivijaya Singh in troubled waters? Congress leader booked for sharing misinformation on Khargone violence  Times Now
  4. Bhopal: If you want to run bulldozers illegally then don’t differentiate on the basis of religion, says  Free Press Journal
  5. FIR registered against Congress Digvijaya Singh for fake tweet on Khargone violence  Firstpost
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: In his speech in Bhikangaon, Kapil Mishra referred to Hizbul Mujahideen militant Burhan Wani, who was killed in Kashmir in 2016, saying, “Jiss ghar se Burhan niklega, uss ghar mein ghus kar maarenge (We will enter the homes where Burhans are born, and beat them up).”
